DOC.brief_summary: Patients undergo cardiac surgery randomize one two group . Group A administer insulin use hyperinsulinemic-normoglycemic clamp normalize blood glucose level intra-operatively . Group B administer insulin standard care level establish participate institution . Patients follow 10 day , 15 day one year post-operatively .
DOC.brief_title: Outcomes Study Hyperinsulinemic Glucose Control Cardiac Surgery
DOC.criteria: Age 1890 year old Scheduled cardiac surgery require cardiopulmonary bypass Offpump surgical procedure Anticipated deep hypothermic circulatory arrest In available , baseline cardiac troponin I ( > 0.5 ng/L ) troponin T ( > 0.1 ng/mL ) level ( RVH CC , respectively ) Any contraindication propose intervention Active infection , include patient endocarditis infected pacemaker lead . Any infection require long term antibiotic ( > 14 day )
